title: Contemporary Diamond Mangalsutra with Rose Gold Accents
features: A modern square pendant with multi-layered cubic zirconia diamonds set in a pave setting. Traditional black beads are incorporated on a delicate chain. The pendant boasts a concentric square design, creating a captivating geometric pattern with a central diamond sparkler. The rose gold finish provides a soft, romantic touch.
occasions: Special occasions blending tradition with modern flair.
description: A contemporary twist on the traditional Mangalsutra, this piece beautifully blends cultural significance with modern aesthetics. The high-quality cubic zirconia diamonds offer exceptional brilliance, while the rose gold plating ensures a durable and lasting finish. Its unique design makes it a versatile piece that can be worn daily or on special occasions, symbolising commitment with a touch of modern elegance.
